plugins.name: swimlanes
plugins.description: Generate professional sequence diagrams directly from natural language descriptions using Swimlanes.io syntax. Describe any workflow (authentication flows, API interactions, microservice communication, CI/CD pipelines) and get correctly formatted diagram code instantly. Supports solid, dashed, and bold arrows, conditional branches, grouping, notes with markdown formatting, auto-numbering, and Font Awesome icons. Paste the output at swimlanes.io to render a polished, shareable diagram.
